EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} Proposal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.proposal_issued_to_1__c},
It’s been over a month since I sent you a proposal for the scope of work we’ve discussed. Do you have any questions I can help clarify on the proposal? I’m here to help move forward with the project in any way I can. Communication always helps further develop a clear scope of work.
This blog article that I wrote listed helps describe the engineering process a bit more in depth, from the beginning to the end:
http://www.ny-engineers.com/blog/the-engineering-process-start-to-finish
Please contact me at your earliest convenience.
Thank you! {!Opportunity.Sales_Head__c}, Principal
135 W 41st Street, 5th Floor New York, NY 10018 212.575.5300 w. NYE FaceBook
